analyzed: sauptikaparva
nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam

original: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayamudīrayet // Bhmj_11.1 //
analyzed: devīm sarasvatīm vyāsam tatas jayam udīrayet
pratāpa dhāmni yāte stam ravau kamalinī priye
śoka avakīrṇa keśena tamobhiḥ abhavat mahī
kṣayam kālena nīte hni śānte saṃdhyā ācita anale
asthi śeṣaiḥ iva āpūrṇam tārakābhiḥ abhūt nabhaḥ
śyāmā pratyagra duḥkhena prasarat timira añjanā
babhāra tāra taralām nakṣatra aśru kaṇā āvalīm
ghore tasmin niśā vaktre ghora sattva ghane vane
śramāt nidrām upagate kṛpe sa kṛtavarmaṇi
dhyāyan duryodhana vadham manyu hālāhala ākulaḥ
pratijñām śatru nidhane drauṇiḥ ekaḥ vyacintayat
atrā antare dadarśa ucca nyagrodha śikhara āśrayam
vadhyamānam ulūkena vāyasānām ca maṇḍalam
kākān kāla balena etya dṛṣṭvā ghūkena pātitān
tām eva pāṇḍava vadhe nītim drauṇiḥ acintayat

original: krudhā krūrāṃ dhiyaṃ kṛtvā kṛpabhojau vibodhya saḥ /
analyzed: krudhā krūrām dhiyam kṛtvā kṛpa bhojau vibodhya saḥ

original: uvāca niḥśvasandīrghaṃ dahyamāna iva krudhā // Bhmj_11.9 //
analyzed: uvāca niḥśvasan dīrgham dahyamānaḥ iva krudhā
rājā rāja sahasrāṇām ekākī viṣama sthitiḥ
vyājāt asmāsu jīvatsu bhīmasenena pātitaḥ
śastram vahadbhiḥ mithyā eva dṛṣṭaḥ smābhiḥ sa bhū tale
aśru pāta pratīkāra akṣamaiḥ klībataraiḥ iva
deśa kālau samāśritya vadhyaḥ sarva ātmanā ripuḥ
tasmāt prasuptān adya eva sa anugān hanmi pāṇḍavān
śrutvā etat kūṇita manāḥ prasupta vadha pātakam

original: kṛpaḥ kṛpākulo nindannabhāṣata sutaṃ svasuḥ // Bhmj_11.13 //
analyzed: kṛpaḥ kṛpā ākulaḥ nindan abhāṣata sutam svasuḥ
dhik etat kutsitam yuddham niśceṣṭaḥ yatra hanyate

original: bhagnadhairye 'pi no vīrāḥ praharanti yaśasvinaḥ // Bhmj_11.14 //
analyzed: bhagna dhairye pi naḥ vīrāḥ praharanti yaśasvinaḥ

original: bhavānahaṃ ca bhojaśca kartāraḥ prātareva tat /
analyzed: bhavān aham ca bhojaḥ ca kartāraḥ prātar eva tat
punar yena na yāsyāmaḥ duryodhana vadha vyathām
surāṇām api paryāptāḥ saṃhatāḥ samare vayam

original: pravekṣyāmo vairivanaṃ jvalitā iva pāvakāḥ // Bhmj_11.16 //
analyzed: pravekṣyāmaḥ vairi vanam jvalitāḥ iva pāvakāḥ
gautamena iti abhihite saṃmate kṛtavarmaṇaḥ
niḥśvasan sa aśru nyanaḥ punar draiṇiḥ abhāṣata
māyā upamāḥ vidagdheṣu nikṛtyā vicaraḥ tu ye
spṛśanti adharma maryādām na te tad phala bhāginaḥ

original: arjunena hataḥ karṇaḥ sa ca śāntanavo yathā /
analyzed: arjunena hataḥ karṇaḥ sa ca śāntanavaḥ yathā

original: tatkiṃ na viditaṃ loke śeṣaṃ vaktuṃ na pāryate // Bhmj_11.19 //
analyzed: tat kim na viditam loke śeṣam vaktum na pāryate
adhunā svasti dharmāya racitaḥ smai mayā añjaliḥ
parābhavam imam tāvat na sahe marma dāraṇam
drauṇiḥ dāruṇa saṃkalpam iti uktvā kṛta niścayaḥ
rathena tamasi prāyāt śibiram kaurava dviṣam
kṛṣṇasya śāsanāt pūrvam yāteṣu śibira antaram

original: saha sātyakinā yodhaiḥ pāṇḍaveṣu vinānugaiḥ // Bhmj_11.22 //
analyzed: saha sātyakinā yodhaiḥ pāṇḍaveṣu vinā anugaiḥ
kṛpa bhojau atikramya javāt drauṇiḥ upāgataḥ
śibira dvāram āsādya mahat bhūtam vyalokayat
hari śmaśru jaṭā netram jvālānām iva saṃcayam
tamasām iva saṃghātam añjana acala saṃnibham
sahasra śīrṣa nayanam sahasra caraṇa adbhutam
sarpa yajñopavīta aṅgam sarpa keyūra kaṅkaṇam
bhayaṃkaram bhayasya api kṛtāntasya iva daivatam
tat dṛṣṭvā ghora saṃrambhaḥ drauṇiḥ durjaya vikramaḥ
sarva āyudha āvalī tasmai prāhiṇauḥ dhairya bhūdharaḥ
tāni āyudhāni sahasā jvalitāni eva tejasā

original: bṛmbhamāṇaṃ mahadbhūtaṃ tadāsādya kṣayaṃ yayuḥ // Bhmj_11.27 //
analyzed: bṛmbhamāṇam mahat bhūtam tat āsādya kṣayam yayuḥ
drauṇiḥ tatas tad ākāra marīcibhyaḥ vyalokayat
cakra āyudha sahasraṇi niḥsṛtāni sa vismayaḥ
kṣaṇāt grasta āyudhaḥ tena gāḍha anuśaya tāpitaḥ

original: prastutaṃ malinaṃ karma nininda svayamākulaḥ // Bhmj_11.29 //
analyzed: prastutam malinam karma nininda svayam ākulaḥ
sa rathāt avatīrya atha prayataḥ tripurāntakam
śūlinam śaraṇam prāyāt tad stotra mukhara ānanaḥ
ātma upahāram rudrāya tasmin dātum samudyate
jvālā ākulā hema vedī purastāt pratyadṛśyata
tad udbhūtaiḥ gaṇaiḥ ghoraiḥ nānā prāṇi mukha udaraiḥ
nānā praharaṇaiḥ dīptaiḥ vyoma kṣipram apūrayat
tatas vedyām mahā vahnau jvalite droṇa nandanaḥ
bhaktyā ātmānam trinetrāya nivedya abhyapatat svayam
tuṣṭaḥ tha bhagavān etya svayam andhaka sūdanaḥ
tam uvāca svam eva aṃśam uttiṣṭha aṅgirasām vara
saṃsthānāya mayā etāvat kṛtam kaiṭabha vidviṣaḥ

original: ātgānaṃ viddhi me kṛṣṇaṃ sa me bahumataḥ sadā // Bhmj_11.35 //
analyzed: ātgānam viddhi me kṛṣṇam sa me bahu mataḥ sadā
kāla pakvāḥ tu pāñcālāḥ na eṣām rakṣā asti kutracid
gṛhāṇa khaḍgam etena dāraya etān aśaṅkitaḥ

original: ityuktvā bhairave dīptaṃ khaḍgaṃ datvā tirohite /
analyzed: iti uktvā bhairave dīptam khaḍgam da tvā tirohite
tadā vikārāt duṣprekṣyaḥ drauṇiḥ śibiram āviśat

original: dvāri bhojakṛpau dhṛtvā vidrutānāṃ vadhāya saḥ /
analyzed: dvāri bhoja kṛpau dhṛtvā vidrutānām vadhāya saḥ

original: praviśya śayane śubhre dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ vyalokayat // Bhmj_11.38 //
analyzed: praviśya śayane śubhre dhṛṣṭadyumnam vyalokayat
tāra hāra aṃśu nakharam dīpta kesari saṃnibham
ghūrṇamāna śikhaiḥ dīpaiḥ vismayāt iva vīkṣitam
aneka raṇa saṃmarda śrāntaiḥ nidrā vimohitaiḥ
adhiṣṭhitam bahu bhaṭaiḥ mukta paryāṇa vāhanaiḥ
tam dṛṣṭvā kopa śikhinā dahyamānaḥ smaran pituḥ

original: uttiṣṭha re gurughneti drauṇiruktvā padāspṛśat // Bhmj_11.41 //
analyzed: uttiṣṭha re guru ghna iti drauṇiḥ uktvā pada aspṛśat
bodhitaḥ sahasā tena saṃbhrama svīkṛta āyudhaḥ
droṇaputram parijñāya cakampe drupada ātmajaḥ
drauṇiḥ tam utthitam vegāt mālyavadbhiḥ śiroruhaiḥ
ākṛṣya apātayat kaṇṭhe gāḍham niṣpīḍya vihvalam
niṣpiṣyamāṇaḥ saṃrambhāt rakta udgāra ākula ānanaḥ
kupitvā pādayoḥ draiṇim nakhaiḥ dantaiḥ ca visphuran

original: śastreṇa chindhi māṃ tūrṇaṃ mā padeneti gadgadam /
analyzed: śastreṇa chinddhi mām tūrṇam mā padena iti gadgadam
kaṇṭha ruddha svaraḥ śvāsāt asphuṭa akṣaram abhyadhāt
tam abravīt droṇa sutaḥ pāpa padbhyām nihanyase

original: lokānāṃ śastrapūtānāṃ na pāpaṃ gurughātinām // Bhmj_11.46 //
analyzed: lokānām śastra pūtānām na pāpam guru ghātinām
iti uktvā caraṇa āghātaiḥ jarjaram tam apothayat
tasmin hate tad vimarda śabdena bubudhe janaḥ
dhṛṣṭadyumna vadhaḥ
tatas drauṇim samālekya ripu rakta chaṭā aṅkitam
pāñcālāḥ draupadeyāḥ ca kālaḥ yam iti menire
nidrā śeṣa aruṇa dṛśām śastrāṇi ānayatām mithas
krośatām varma varmā iti teṣām āsīt mahā svanaḥ

original: kva gajaḥ kva rathaḥ kvāśvaḥ kva cāpaṃ kva śilīmukhāḥ /
analyzed: kva gajaḥ kva rathaḥ kva aśvaḥ kva cāpam kva śilīmukhāḥ
iti bruvāṇān khaṅgena drauṇiḥ ciccheda tān krudhā
hatvā uttamaujasam padbhyām kaṇṭhe kaṭhina vikramaḥ
gadā hastam yudhāmanyum niṣpipeṣa virāviṇam

original: tataḥ khaṅgena śūrāṇāṃ śirāṃsi bhuvi pātayan /
analyzed: tatas khaṅgena śūrāṇām śirāṃsi bhuvi pātayan

original: kālarātryāḥ sa vidadhe vinodaṃ kandukairiva // Bhmj_11.52 //
analyzed: kālarātryāḥ sa vidadhe vinodam kandukaiḥ iva
kṛṣṇā sutān āpatataḥ draupadeyān asaṃbhramāt
cakāra karavālena sa kāla kavala ucitān
prativindhye hate vīre sutasome nipātite

original: śrutakīrtai śatānīke chinne ca śrutavarmaṇi // Bhmj_11.54 //
analyzed: śrutakīrtaiḥ śatānīke chinne ca śrutavarmaṇi
śikhaṇḍī kṛṣṭa kodaṇḍaḥ śaraiḥ draiṇim apūrayat

original: droṇaputro 'pi khaḍgena kruddhastaṃ vidadhe dvidhā // Bhmj_11.55 //
analyzed: droṇaputraḥ pi khaḍgena kruddhaḥ tam vidadhe dvidhā
draupadeya śikhaṇḍi vadhaḥ
kopāt ācārya putreṇa vadhyamānāḥ prabhadrakāḥ
matsya sṛñjaya pāñcālāḥ kālam dadṛśuḥ antike
asitam rakta vasanam rakta mālya anulepanam

original: hasantaṃ vīkṣya taṃ vīrāḥ saṃhāraṃ menire sphṛṭam // Bhmj_11.57 //
analyzed: hasantam vīkṣya tam vīrāḥ saṃhāram menire sphṛṭam
ghana andhakāre vīrāṇām ratha kuñjara vājinām

original: yodhānāṃ ca kṣayaṃ dvāri cakraturbhojagautamau // Bhmj_11.58 //
analyzed: yodhānām ca kṣayam dvāri cakratuḥ bhoja gautamau
evam akṣauhiṇīm hatvā vasā rakta anulepanaḥ
niryayau raudra caritaḥ drauṇiḥ bhairava vigrahaḥ

original: sa gatvā sahitastūrṇaṃ hārdikyena kṛpeṇa ca /
analyzed: sa gatvā sahitaḥ tūrṇam hārdikyena kṛpeṇa ca

original: dadarśa bhuvi rājānaṃ bhagnaśaktiṃ suyodhanam // Bhmj_11.60 //
analyzed: dadarśa bhuvi rājānam bhagna śaktim suyodhanam
vārayantam gadā agreṇa muhur kravyāda maṇḍalam
vyathayā bhakṣayantam vasuṃdharām
śoṇitam vadana udvāntam parimṛjya āśu tasya te
sarva pāñcala saṃhāra kathayā vavṛṣuḥ sudhām
sa kiṃcid śeṣa jīvaḥ tat śrutvā vṛtta kandharaḥ
paryanta grasita avyakta bhāṣitaiḥ praśaśaṃsa tān
sa pariṣvajya yatnena drauṇim sa aśru vilocanam
punar naḥ saṃgamaḥ svarge bhūyāt iti avadat śanais

original: aṅge vidhāya dayitāṃ sa gadāṃ sadaiva bhuktāṃ ciraṃ vasumatīmavagūhya dorbhyām /
analyzed: aṅge vidhāya dayitām sa gadām sadā eva bhuktām ciram vasumatīm avagūhya dorbhyām

original: karṇāvalambitabalodgatajīvacāro vīraḥ śanaiḥ suravadhūpraṇayī babhūva // Bhmj_11.65 //
analyzed: karṇa avalambita bala udgata jīva cāraḥ vīraḥ śanais sura vadhū praṇayī babhūva
duryodhana svarga gamanam
atra antare prayātāyām kṣapāyām kṣapita arayaḥ

original: jajñire pāṇḍavāḥ karma dāruṇaṃ drauṇinā kṛtam // Bhmj_11.66 //
analyzed: jajñire pāṇḍavāḥ karma dāruṇam drauṇinā kṛtam
muktān mahā bhayāt tasmāt kṛṣṇā śrutvā hatān sutān
anujān ca sa pāñcālān papāta bhuvi mūrcchitā
śanakais labdha saṃjñā sā vilapantī su locanā
pārthānām śoka vidhurā hṛdayāni vyadārayat
yāvat na viśikhaiḥ kṛttam uttamāṅgam vikarmaṇaḥ
drauṇeḥ dṛṣṭam mayā tāvat jīvitasya ayam añjaliḥ
iti uktvā draupadī duḥkhāt vīkṣamāṇā vṛkodaram
na uvāca kiṃcid saṃtāpāt maraṇe kṛta niścayā
tatas bhīmaḥ priyā śoka śūlena abhyāhataḥ hṛdi
prayayau ratham āruhya droṇaputra jighāṃsayā
vrajataḥ tasya kālagneḥ iva lokān didhakṣataḥ

original: dhūmamālābhramaṃ cakre lalāṭe bhrukuṭiḥ kṣaṇam // Bhmj_11.72 //
analyzed: dhūma mālā bhramam cakre lalāṭe bhrukuṭiḥ kṣaṇam
raudraḥ rudra āśrayaḥ drauṇiḥ kruddhaḥ ca pavanātmajaḥ
gacchāmaḥ pṛṣṭhatas tasmāt iti ūce pāṇḍavān hariḥ
tatas kirīṭi pramukhāḥ saha sātyakinā yayuḥ

original: rathinaḥ seṣavaḥ sarve pāṇḍuputrā yuyutsavaḥ // Bhmj_11.74 //
analyzed: rathinaḥ sa iṣavaḥ sarve pāṇḍu putrāḥ yuyutsavaḥ
tatas te drauṇim āsādya prasupta vadha pātakāt
dhvasta chāyam kriyā hīnam kopena ākula tām yayuḥ
abhidrute bhīmasene drauṇim nakula sārathau
pāda cārī ghṛta abhyaktaḥ sarasvatyāḥ taṭe kṣaṇam
apāṇḍavam jagat kartum brahma śīrṣa astram ādade
tad vināśāya pārtho pi brahmāstram asṛjat kṛtī
yena abhavan diśaḥ vyāptāḥ kampa ātaṅka taraṅgitāḥ
atrā antare samabhyāyāt nāradena saha svayam
muniḥ satyavatī sūnuḥ bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ
saḥ bravīt droṇa tanayam jiṣṇum ca kṣaya śaṅkitaḥ
ayam divya astra saṃmarde hata vīram jagat dahet

original: pārtha saṃhara divyāstraṃ tvaṃ ca drauṇe girā mama /
analyzed: pārtha saṃhara divya astram tvam ca drauṇe girā mama

original: akāṇḍe mā bhavantvete lokāḥ pralayabhāginaḥ // Bhmj_11.80 //
analyzed: akāṇḍe mā bhavantu ete lokāḥ pralaya bhāginaḥ
iti ukte muninā kṣipram saṃjahāra astram arjunaḥ
drauṇiḥ prayoga kuśalaḥ na īśaḥ bhūdastra saṃhṛtau
tatas prajvalite loke vyathite sura maṇḍale
abhimanyu vadhū garbhe drauṇiḥ astram apātayat
bhūyas tad pratiṣedhāya putra saṃtāna vāñchayā
nindan droṇa sutam pārthaḥ tat astram kupitaḥ sṛjat
tatas kṛṣṇaḥ vadat jiṣṇum viṣaṇṇam saṃtati kṣayāt

original: mā śuco dhairyajaladhe na te vaṃśo vinaṅkṣyati // Bhmj_11.84 //
analyzed: mā śucaḥ dhairya jaladhe na te vaṃśaḥ vinaṅkṣyati
jātu enam jīvayiṣyāmi dagdham api astra tejasā

original: uttarāyāḥ sthitaṃ garbhe saubhadratanayaṃ śiśum // Bhmj_11.85 //
analyzed: uttarāyāḥ sthitam garbhe saubhadra tanayam śiśum

original: iti bruvāṇe govinde pārthāstre jvalite bhuvi /
analyzed: iti bruvāṇe govinde pārtha astre jvalite bhuvi

original: uvāca droṇatanayaṃ vyāso devarṣiṇā saha // Bhmj_11.86 //
analyzed: uvāca droṇa tanayam vyāsaḥ deva ṛṣiṇā saha
tyaja cūḍāmaṇim rakṣa jīva ratnam mahā astrataḥ

original: aśaktaśca pramādī ca jānīṣe na yathocitam // Bhmj_11.87 //
analyzed: aśaktaḥ ca pramādī ca jānīṣe na yathocitam
vatsarāṇām sahasra tvam visra rogī samāhitaḥ
durbhikṣa vyañjakaḥ duḥkhī vijane vicariṣyasi
iti śaptaḥ guru sutaḥ kopāt vyāsam abhāṣata

original: vyasane patitaḥ kasmātkṣipto 'haṃ saṃkaṭe tvayā // Bhmj_11.89 //
analyzed: vyasane patitaḥ kasmāt kṣiptaḥ ham saṃkaṭe tvayā

original: yatra yatra bhaviṣyāmi tatra tatra mamānugaḥ /
analyzed: yatra yatra bhaviṣyāmi tatra tatra mama anugaḥ

original: tvamapi pratiśāpena mune nityaṃ bhaviṣyasi // Bhmj_11.90 //
analyzed: tvam api pratiśāpena mune nityam bhaviṣyasi
iti uktvā astra upahārāya cūḍāratnam vitīrya saḥ

original: prayayau droṇatanayo muniśca muninā saha // Bhmj_11.91 //
analyzed: prayayau droṇa tanayaḥ muniḥ ca muninā saha

original: tataḥ praśānte brahmāstre pāṇḍavāḥ saha śauriṇā /
analyzed: tatas praśānte brahmāstre pāṇḍavāḥ saha śauriṇā
cūḍāratnam samādāya yājñasenyai nyavedayan
aiṣīkam astram
evam prasādya pāñcālīm śoka ārtāḥ pāṇḍu nandanāḥ

original: pāñcālakadanaṃ ghoraṃ dhyāyanto na yayurvṛtim // Bhmj_11.93 //
analyzed: pāñcāla kadanam ghoram dhyāyantaḥ na yayuḥ vṛtim
saṃjayena iti kathite śrutvā rājā ambikāsutaḥ
papāta mūrcchitaḥ mohāt līna śoka analaḥ kṣaṇam
tam śīta salila āpūraiḥ āśvāsya uvāca saṃjayaḥ
mantriṇaḥ ca priyān putrān śocantam vyathita indriyam
svapna māyā vilasitaiḥ paryante śoka moha daiḥ
saṃsāra vibhramaiḥ dhīrāḥ spṛśyante na manīṣiṇaḥ
deva aindrajālika kṛtaiḥ chāyā krīḍanakaiḥ iva

original: putrairdhanaiśca dāraiśca na muhyanti madāśayāḥ // Bhmj_11.97 //
analyzed: putraiḥ dhanaiḥ ca dāraiḥ ca na muhyanti mad āśayāḥ
upekṣitaḥ tvayā eva ayam durnayāt bāndhava kṣayaḥ
vṛtte tasmin na mithyā eva śokam kartum iha arhasi
prabhāva prabhavaiḥ bhāvaiḥ māyā vibhava bhāvitaiḥ

original: abhāvaniṣṭhāparyantaiḥ satāṃ na kriyate bhramaḥ // Bhmj_11.99 //
analyzed: abhāva niṣṭhā paryantaiḥ satām na kriyate bhramaḥ
sva karma mudrite loke niyatau pralaya udadhau

original: kalayāmi na kālasya kaśca tāvati vartate // Bhmj_11.100 //
analyzed: kalayāmi na kālasya kaḥ ca tāvati vartate
ityādi saṃjaya mukhāḥ nṛpam ugra moha bhagnam svayam vihita durnaya dṛṣṭa pāram
helā valat kalabha cñcala karṇa tāla lolām bhava sthiti kathām asakṛt tam ūcuḥ
iti kṣemendra viracitāyām bhāratamañjaryām sauptikaparva
